word:
W.C. White: About 20,000 copies of "Ministry of Healing" have been put out, and there is so little being done in the relief way, that now we are planning to get out a subscription edition at the beginning of the year, to be sold by the agents in the regular way. Still, those who wish will have the privilege of using "Ministry" as a relief book wherever they desire to do so. 


                               -292-
